ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides functions that wrap HTML Bootstrap components code to enable the design and layout of informative landing home pages for Shiny applications. This can lead to a better user experience for the users and writing less HTML for the developer.

Provides functions that wrap HTML Bootstrap components code to enable the design and layout of informative landing home pages for Shiny applications. This can lead to a better user experience for the users and writing less HTML for the developer.

name: r-shinylp
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-shinylp
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/shinyLP_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/shinyLP/shinyLP_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cc129b34048b1a00e18a24ccd6f1c357e7f13b084995c5010b0787af564bb1b1

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 2
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-shiny
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-shiny

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('shinyLP')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('shinyLP')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/jasdumas/shinyLP
  license: MIT
  summary: Provides functions that wrap HTML Bootstrap components code to enable the design and layout of informative landing home pages for Shiny applications. This can lead to a better user experience for the users and writing less HTML for the developer.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
